Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-11-1-6 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

Step.Notification:

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Correct response with Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "false"
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present Access Point has capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "false"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Correct response with missed Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present Access Point has missed capabilities.ExternalAuthorization

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: No event with Topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" there is not an event with Topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: No event with Topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Credential
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" there is not an event with Topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Credential

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Event tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is not topic
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect Source.SimpleItemDescription.Name in tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Name = "AccessPointToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect Source.SimpleItemDescription.Type in tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Name in tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential event (CredentialToken)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: Incorrect Data.SimpleItemDescription.Type in tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential event (CredentialToken)
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" Event with topic tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is incorrect: event contains no Source.SimpleItemDescription item with Type = "pt:ReferenceToken"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: tns1:AccessControl/Request/Timeout/Credential is property event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true"

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: The first Notify message is incorrect: not expected token
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" The first Notify message has not expected token

Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT does not send the first notify message

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: No the second notyfy message
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT does not send the second notify message

Step.Notification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"> <Body> <Notify xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:tns1="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/topics">

</NotificationMessage> </Notify> </Body> </Envelope>

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: The second notify message: not expexted event
Test.Description: A.1: one AccessPoint, MaxLimit is present There is Access Point with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = "true" and Capabilities.ExternalAuthorization = "true" DUT sends notify message with not expected event

Step.Notification:

Test.TestName: ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS TIMEOUT WITH CREDENTIAL (EXTERNAL AUTHORIZATION)
Test.Name: The first norification was received in bad time
